title: Why Hamilton was so unhappy with the stewards in Sochi
description: Lewis Hamilton’s bid to match Michael Schumacher’s 91 wins quickly descended to controversy at the Russian Grand Prix.
itunes:title: Why Hamilton was so unhappy with the stewards in Sochi
itunes:author: ESPN, Alexis Nunes, Laurence Edmondson, Nate Saunders
itunes:subtitle: Lewis Hamilton’s bid to match Michael Schumacher’s 91 wins quickly descended to controversy at the Russian Grand Prix.
